about_the_game:
Shinobi Unleashed is an MMORPG where you create the ultimate shinobi. Play alone or with friends and cast powerful jutsus like summoning a meteor or a ball of lightning in the palm of your hand to thrust into your enemy. Create clans and assign rank to form long lasting relationships or invite newely made friends to a party for quick co-op gaming; global, clan, and party chat allow for strategic planning and execution. After you're done defeating powerful foes sell the gear and scrolls to vendors in the city or even to other players! You can trade item for item as well. Progress saves so you can build the ultimate account over time and become unstoppable. Have fun.

Explore the 35+ square mile Land of Water. Spanning 2 major islands and all the smaller islands that connect them. Distant mountains, hidden villages, coastal towns, mines, farmlands, and a huge expanse of wilderness to uncover.

Over 70 jutsu abilities ranging from summoning meteors, lightning strikes, susannoo armor, self healing, ice walls, earth bending and more. 

Invite your friends or play single player. Create clans to form long living relationships and assign rank or invite a new friend to a party for a quick session.

Defeated enemies drop loot and jutsus based on rarity and chance. Collect rare items on your journey and sell them for profits or even trade weapon for weapon with vendors and other players! 

Global, clan, and party chat allow for strategic planning and execution.

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB video card
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Shinobi Unleashed is an open world MMORPG that allows players to create the ultimate shinobi. Play with friends or in single player, cast powerful jutsus, create clans or invite new friends to a party, defeat enemies and collect rare items and jutsu then sell or trade them with other players!
